dc.title: United States Department of Labor, Office of Administrative Law Judges, Home Page
dc.description: The U.S. Department of Labor, Office of Administrative Law Judges, is the trial court for most Department's formal adjudications, such as black lung and longshore workers' compensation programs, nuclear and environmental whistleblower cases, OFCCP enforcement actions, Workforce Investment Act disputes, permanent and temporary alien labor certications, and a wide variety of other case types.
dc.subject: hearing
adjudication
administrative law judge
